mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 13, 2022: Las Vegas to Amarillo

* Flight from Las Vegas to Amarillo (F3974661, $235 per person)
* Duration: 2 hours 1 minute
* Departure time: 12:00 from Las Vegas
* Arrival time: 16:01 at Rick Husband Amarillo International Airport (AMA)

Accommodation in Amarillo (March 13 - March 15, 2022):

* The Residences of Amarillo Downtown, $189 per night, private room that allows pets

Dinner options in Amarello:

* Metropolis Restaurant (American, Mediterranean)
* Coyote Bluff Cafe (American, Mexican)

Day 2 - March 14, 2022: Exploring Amarillo

* Breakfast at your accommodation or try Golden Light Cafe (American, Mexican)
* Visit the following attractions:
	+ Cadillac Ranch
	+ Amarillo Museum of Art
	+ Palo Duro Canyon State Park
* Lunch options:
	+ La Frontera (Mexican)
	+ Joe Taco (American, Mexican)
* Dinner at Yellow City Street Food (American, Mediterranean)

Day 3 - March 15, 2022: Amarillo to Lubbock

* Self-driving from Amarillo to Lubbock (duration: 1 hour 47 mins, distance: 197 km, cost: $9)
	+ Alternatively, take a taxi for $197
* Arrival at Lubbock Preston Smith International Airport (LBB) and check-in at your accommodation

Accommodation in Lubbock (March 15 - March 17, 2022):

* Woodrow House Suites, $149 per night, private room that allows pets

Dinner options in Lubbock:

* Origami Japanese Restaurant (American, Asian)
* La Diosa Cellars (American, Mediterranean)
* Cast Iron Grill (American, Mexican)

Day 4 - March 16, 2022: Exploring Lubbock

* Breakfast at your accommodation or visit The Coffee Shop (American)
* Visit the following attractions:
	+ American Wind Power Center
	+ Buddy Holly Center
	+ Texas Tech University campus
* Lunch options:
	+ Chipotle Mexican Grill (American, Mexican)
	+ Taco Bell Cantina (American, Mexican)
* Dinner at Triple J Chophouse and Bar (American, Mediterranean) or La Salsa Fresh Mexican Grill (Mexican)

Day 5 - March 17, 2022: Lubbock to Las Vegas

* Flight from Lubbock to Las Vegas (F4024113, $165 per person)
* Departure time: 17:40 from Lubbock
* Arrival time: 17:47 at McCarran International Airport (LAS)

Estimated Total Cost:

* Flights: $600
* Accommodations: $527
* Ground transportation and fuel: $206
* Food, activities, and misc.: $2,267
Total cost is approximately $3,600, which leaves a buffer of $100 for unexpected expenses or emergencies.
